decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 7th April 2017 and numbered: Unnumbered Location Plan; Unnumbered Block Plan; Unnumbered Existing Elevation Plan and documents submitted 19th May 2017 and referenced Unnumbered photo of materials; Amended Information e-mail correspondence from Patricia Williams, therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the building and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - As specified in email correspondence with the Applicant received on 19/05/2017, the external cladding shall be fibre cement material with "Cedar" (wood effect) finish. This cladding shall maintain the existing diagonal style of the buildings and be of colours which match that of the existing buildings.
description: Replacement of existing wooden cladding at the rear of the properties and balconies with fibre cement cladding. In addition three existing single pane windows at the rear of the properties to be replaced with toughened energy efficient single pane windows.
